DOC.brief_summary: The purpose current randomize clinical trial analyze effectiveness craniosacral therapy disability , pain intensity , kinesiophobia , quality life , isometric endurance trunk flexor muscle , mobility , oxygen saturation , blood pressure , cardiac index , biochemical estimation interstitial fluid individual chronic low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Craniosacral Therapy Patients With Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To analyze effect craniosacral therapy disability , pain intensity , quality life , mobility patient chronic low back pain . Design : A single blind randomize control trial . Setting : Clinical setting . Subjects : Sixty-four patient ( 42 female ) chronic low back pain . Interventions : Patients randomly assign experimental group ( craniosacral therapy group ) control group ( classic massage group ) . Main measure : Self-reported disability ( Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire - primary outcome ; Oswestry Disability Index ) , pain intensity ( 10-point Numerical Pain Rating Scale ) , scale kinesiophobia ( Tampa Scale Kinesiophobia ) , isometric endurance trunk flexor muscle ( McQuade Test ) , lumbar mobility flexion , oxygen saturation , blood pressure , cardiac index , biochemical estimation interstitial fluid .
DOC.criteria: 1 . LBP for/over three month . 2. age 18 65 year . 3. score equal superior four point Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire . 4. currently receive physical therapy . 1. presence lumbar stenosis 2. diagnosis spondylolisthesis 3. diagnosis fibromyalgia 4. treatment corticosteroid oral medication within past two week 5. history spinal surgery 6. disease central peripheral nervous system
